lyrics.stanza: Lord, teach us to use The intercessor's rod, As Moses did of old Upon the hill of God.
Before the upstayed arm The ranks of darkness quailed! In great Jehovah's Name The hosts of light prevailed!
Teach us to bind the foe With iron chains of prayer, That all Thy Church may move To victory everywhere.
Give us the steady arm, Until the sun go down, That we in Christ may win The overcomer's crown.
